p.span: WANTED – 2 Food Service Positions. Opening for a Head Cook/Manager and an Assistant Cook. Starting salary based on experience. Benefits include retirement & medical insurance.
If interested, please contact Steve Bucks, Superintendent, Lemmon School District #52-4, 209 Third Street West, Lemmon, SD 57638 Telephone: 1-605-374-3762

p.strong: GRAB & GO LUNCHES FOR REMAINDER OF THE YEAR!

a.span: Lemmon School District will be offering FREE meals for students in grades K-12 FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE YEAR. If you would like your K-12 child to have a "grab & go" lunch through May 18, please fill out the following form or call the High School office at 374-3762 to order.
Click the link below to sign up for "Grab & Go" lunches:

Click HERE to fill out a consent form for ZOOM & GOOGLE MEETS (for children under 14) so your child(ren) will be able to continue using web-based video conferenceing tools for face-to-face interaction with their teachers during the COVID 19 closure.

span.font: Welcome to the Home of the Cowboys and Cowgirls! Located in the northwest corner of the state, our school provides quality education and numerous opportunities to our district's students. The Lemmon School District places great importance on student success and provides a warm, caring atmosphere in which students can thrive.

div.font: To develop productive citizens in a safe, challenging and disciplined environment.

Lemmon School is a community of life-long learners who show pride in themselves, their school and our community by conducting themselves with dignity and demonstrating the highest personal standards of behavior. Lemmon School maintains the highest academic standards, stressing rigorous standard-focused courses and 21st century skills, promoting creativity, and offering a variety of academic and extra curricular activities. Lemmon graduates are well rounded individuals who possess the necessary skills and knowledge to empower their success in our diverse interdependent world.

span.strong: To access videos for athletic & other events held at the Lemmon Armory, click HERE
